body: @D u b b y - no wonder most trans I see keep their dick. I think it's better that way too.

@Billy Boi - Nothing gets cut off, actually. The penis is split down the middle leaving the all important nerves intact, then the spongey erectile tissue on the inside gets scooped out and removed. Any hair on the scrotum would have been removed prior to this part, where the scrotum becomes the interior of the vagina, and the nerve cluster on the prostate is split and relocated to a faux cervix on the inside, and a rough patch where the g-spot is. Then, the skin and nerves around the shaft get sculpted into the labia minora, while the nerves in the glans are brought together and the senseless tissue removed to form the clitoris - this usually comes with a clitoral hood being made too. In some cases, the neo-vagina can get wet on its own, too. In the end, the result is good enough to fool a gynecologist.... nevermind a boyfriend, lol. But I really do wish it was as easy as it is in this manga.
How trannies think cutting their dick  off works
